title: 3.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create a Scratch program with a sprite of your choice. Add a single-colored backdrop having multiple circles of red, green, and yellow color. Write a program to get the following output:
◼ The program should begin with a click on the
.
◼ The sprite should appear at random positions forever.
◼ If the sprite touches the green color, it should hide.
◼ If the sprite touches the red color, it should grow.
◼ If the sprite touches the yellow color, it should draw a square with a pen tool
